summary: A carefree young man's past compels him to confront a criminal boss to acquire land rights.
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Ileana D'Cruz|Mukesh Rishi|Kamalinee Mukherjee|Prakash Raj|Tanikella Bharani|Brahmanandam|Suneel|Ali|Parvati Melton|Dharmavarapu Subramanyam|Sivaji|Uttej|Mahesh Babu|Ravi Varma|Bianca Desai|Makrand Deshpande|Kamal Kamaraju|Kiran Mani|Pammi Sai|Nagesh Salwan
title: Jalsa
